function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of efficient IEQ monitoring","Impact":"Decreased occupant health and productivity","Mitigation":"Implement robust IEQ monitoring systems","Technologies":"Sensor arrays, cloud software platforms","People":"Occupants of commercial office buildings","Owner":"Facility management teams"},{"Description":"Inadequate measurement of Indoor Environmental Quality (IEQ)","Impact":"Inaccurate data for input to IEQ performance metrics","Mitigation":"Adopt accurate measurement protocols and standards","Technologies":"Sensors, data transformation software","People":"Facility management teams","Owner":"Companies aspiring to sustainability leadership"},{"Description":"Use of outdated comfort assessment systems","Impact":"Inaccurate assessment of thermal comfort","Mitigation":"Adopt modern and accurate comfort assessment systems","Technologies":"Sensor arrays, modern comfort assessment systems","People":"Occupants of commercial office buildings","Owner":"Facility management teams"}]}
